title: Industrial CT Scanning
subtitle: Non-destructive digital capture with micron-accurate precision.
overview:
Our industrial CT scanning technology creates perfect digital replicas of your irreplaceable artifacts, capturing both external geometries and internal structures with extraordinary precision. This non-destructive process reveals details invisible to the naked eye, preserving the complete essence of your valuable components.

Every scan is meticulously calibrated to capture the unique characteristics of your specific materials and components, ensuring that no detail—however minute—is overlooked.

specifications.title: Resolution
specifications.description: Down to 5 microns (0.005mm), capturing details invisible to the naked eye

specifications.title: Accuracy
specifications.description: ±2μm precision across all dimensions, verified through rigorous calibration

specifications.title: Scan Volume
specifications.description: Up to 1m × 1m × 1m for large components, with custom solutions available

specifications.title: Material Compatibility
specifications.description: All metals, composites, polymers, ceramics, and organic materials

specifications.title: Output Formats
specifications.description: STL, STEP, IGES, DICOM, and proprietary formats for specialized applications

specifications.title: Analysis Capabilities
specifications.description: Density mapping, void detection, wall thickness analysis, dimensional verification

quote: The difference between approximation and precision is the difference between imitation and preservation.

title: 4D Printing Technology
subtitle: Advanced manufacturing with time-responsive materials.
overview:
Our proprietary 4D printing technology transcends traditional manufacturing limitations, creating components that not only match the original's form but also its functional properties and material behavior over time. The fourth dimension—time—is integrated into every piece we create.

This revolutionary approach allows us to replicate how materials respond to environmental conditions, ensuring authentic performance in all situations while maintaining the option to enhance durability where desired.

specifications.title: Material Integration
specifications.description: Multi-material printing in a single process, with seamless transitions between properties

specifications.title: Temporal Response
specifications.description: Programmable material behavior in response to temperature, humidity, and mechanical stress

specifications.title: Geometric Complexity
specifications.description: Unlimited complexity with no traditional manufacturing constraints

specifications.title: Resolution
specifications.description: Layer thickness down to 16 microns with in-layer detail to 8 microns

specifications.title: Material Library
specifications.description: Over 200 base materials with customizable properties, including metals, polymers, and ceramics

specifications.title: Functional Enhancement
specifications.description: Optional integration of improved wear resistance, thermal properties, or structural integrity

quote: True replication isn't just about what something is, but how it changes and responds over time.

title: White Glove Delivery
subtitle: Concierge-level care with uncompromising attention to detail.
overview:
From initial consultation to final installation, our white glove service ensures that every aspect of your experience with PERPETUA meets the highest standards of luxury and discretion. We understand that the journey of your irreplaceable artifacts is as important as the destination.

Our specialists handle every detail with meticulous care, from secure transportation in custom-designed, climate-controlled cases to expert installation that ensures perfect integration with your collection.

specifications.title: Consultation
specifications.description: Private meetings at our atelier or your location, with complete confidentiality

specifications.title: Transportation
specifications.description: Custom-designed, climate-controlled cases with GPS tracking and security protocols

specifications.title: Insurance
specifications.description: Comprehensive coverage throughout the entire process, with no exclusions

specifications.title: Installation
